alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 2:22PM PST until December 27 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations around a quarter inch below 2000 feet. * WHERE...In Oregon, Upper Hood River Valley and Central Columbia River Gorge. In Washington, Central Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
